widgets.onCreate:
globals.show_comment = function (v="", pre_text="", post_text="") { 
  set('tooltip', pre_text + " " + getProp('this', 'comments') + " " + v + post_text) }

widgets.label: %key
OSC{label}
OSC{label}
OSC{label}
OSC{label}
#{@{this} == 1 ? "^recycle.spin" : "^recycle"}
OSC{label}
OSC{label}
OSC{label}
OSC{label}
#{@{this} == 1 ? "^recycle.spin" : "^recycle"}

widgets.onValue:
globals.show_comment(value, getVar('modal_cymbal_inst', 'inst') + ": ")
// set modal label color to orange if range is modified 
setVar("modal_cymbal_inst", "inst_color", JSON.stringify(value) == JSON.stringify([0, 1]) ? "auto" : "darkorange")
console.log("range: " + value)

widgets.label: #{@{this} === 1 ? "^hand-holding-heart.flip-horizontal" : "^hand-holding-heart"}
widgets.onValue:
var add_remove = value===0 ? "Add to" : "Remove from"
globals.show_comment("", getVar('modal_cymbal_inst', 'inst') + ": " + add_remove)

widgets.label: OSC{label}
OSC{label}
OSC{label}
OSC{label}

widgets.onValue:
set('bass_amp', get('bass_amp')*0.9)
set('chord_amp', get('chord_amp')*0.9)
set('cymbal_amp', get('cymbal_amp')*0.9)
set('snare_amp', get('snare_amp')*0.9)
set('kick_amp', get('kick_amp')*0.9)
widgets.label: ^volume-low
OSC{label}

OSC{label}

widgets.comments: index of the bass point at the beat position (or -1)
index of the chord point at the beat position (or -1)
scale notes array to populate keyboard_scale

widgets.onCreate:
// setting initial values just for testing without osc client
  setVar('bass_line', 'pts', 3)
  set('bass_line', [2, 0, 5, 0, 12, 0])
  set('bass_update', 0)

// setting initial values just for testing without osc client
  setVar('chord_line', 'pts', 3)
  set('chord_line', [3, 0, 8, 0, 15, 0])
  set('chord_update', 0)
